attributes.action: Encourage travel agents to issue parents, who book holidays abroad, with lists of countries where corporal punishment is already prohibited
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
While corporal punishment towards children remains lawful in the home in the UK, there are countries such as Sweden, Spain, Portugal and Greece where it is prohibited in all settings.

If parents book a holiday abroad at a high street travel agent, employees should issue them with a list of countries where corporal punishment is already banned. If a parent books a holiday online, they should receive a list by post along with their travel documents. That way parents will be prepared and save themselves from potential imprisonment abroad.
